Key Match Events: Gerardo Arteaga scored first goal of game
Pre-Game Insights: Expectations are high for Mexico as they try to avoid disappointing in international tournaments.
Jamaica has not scored a single goal or earned a single point through six Copa America games in their history.
Post-Match Reflections: A big win for El Tri to start with a win.
Losing Edson Alvarez was a tough blow, but they rebounded and Gerardo Arteaga came through with the winning goal.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at NRG Stadium in Houston.
It kicked off at 9:00pm ET / 6:00pm PT.
